patterns: what do you charge for it?
can i get it ch           eaper?
I dont have that much money
responses: We have some options for getting a cheaper SaWa either through a local govenment program or through our carbon credit offset program. Please call 0723-256-2524 to hear if you qualify.

patterns: can i buy it in pakistan
responses: 4Life is not yet being distributed in your country. If you are a distributer please call us on your local number too hear more about our partnership plans

patterns: can i buy it in kenya
responses: Yes please reach out to one of our local partners!
